column7: In FY22, Medibank reviewed materiality assessment to examine the relevance of our existing topics in meeting Medibank's stakeholders' and our expectations and to identify any gaps that might exist. The Group undertook interviews with external and internal stakeholders, a customer insights survey, peer benchmarking and an analysis of our current strategy.
The Group material topics are customer health, employee health, community health, environmental health, and governance.

column13: Medibank's Virtual Psychology Clinic offers accessible and convenient mental health support through online consultations with qualified psychologists. column6: Operations assessed for risks related to corruption
column7: Medibank has zero tolerance for bribery and corruption. The Anti-Bribery and Corruption Policy describes conduct prohibited for directors, employees and contractors when conducting business on behalf of Medibank and how breaches can be reported.

column6: Communication and training about anti-corruption policies and procedures
column7: All employees undertake compulsory compliance training each year to ensure they understand our regulatory obligations and what this means for their role. The training covers risk, anti-bribery and corruption, privacy, bullying and harassment and working in a publicly listed organisation.

column6: Confirmed incidents of corruption and actions taken
column7: Risk assessment must be conducted on at least an annual basis to identify key anti-bribery and corruption risks associated with Medibank's business. The risk assessment must be performed for all business units and relevant entities of the Group.

column6: Legal actions for anti-competitive behavior, anti-trust, and monopoly practices

column7: The Group makes tax payments solely in Australia, with 100% of our operations based in Australia. In addition to paying corporate taxes levied on profits generated for shareholders, we pay goods and services taxes (GST), fringe benefits taxes (FBT), payroll taxes, stamp duties, and health insurance levies.
